name: Post War
description:
Set in a post-apocalyptic environment where people have to live in air-locked buildings due to a biological warfare which resulted in a plant mutation whose pollen is everywhere and paralyzes the humans who inhale it. “Post War” main feature is the possibility of choosing at critical moments in the story the path you want to go to. Finally, choosing a side “The Rebellion”/ “Malignants” and “The Party”/ “The Immune System”. A mission to challenge the players in choosing between self-preservation and morality, between doing the right thing or the necessary one. 

The game has multiple endings (about 6-7) and a few different ways to get to them. 

P.S. : The game has a few bugs so I would appreciate if you comment below if you found one. I will do my best to solve them. 

Some of the problems are:

  • Sometimes you have to press twice to interact
  • You will need the mouse to exit the UI and to navigate the menu
  • It doesn't have a saving system (it doesn't need one because it is a half an hour experience)
